posts.post_content:
Posted By: Eric
Looking for Check or Money Order.  I'd like to avoid PAYPAL, but if you absolutely have to use it, please add the 3% to cover their fees.

Price includes first class shipping w/Delivery confirmation.

First to email me with intent to purchase gets the card(s).

Email: crazylocomerk@yahoo.com


T206 Red Ames Portrait Brown Hindu Back.  Was in an SGC 30 holder.  SOLD
[IMG]http://i84.photobucket.com/albums/k14/crazylocomerk2/1909-11T206AmesRedBrownHINDU.jpg[/IMG]

Posted By: Eric
Edited the post to offer the cards up for sale.  Had them for trade.

Molly Miller (SLer) is sold!

I got two emails at the exact same time for that card.  I've never seen that happen before.  They were answered in the order of my inbox.  Thanks fellas.
